listings.title: Spacious Family Home
listings.subtitle: Quiet Neighborhood, CMC
listings.description: Beautifully designed home in a quiet neighborhood, perfect for families. Close to schools and parks. Open floor plan with modern kitchen and spacious living areas. Large backyard with a deck for entertaining.
featureDescriptions: Perfect for kids to play and for hosting outdoor get-togethers.
Sleek design with stainless steel appliances and ample storage
Spacious and comfortable with a walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom.
The living and dining areas flow seamlessly, creating a bright and welcoming space.

listings.title: Cozy Cottage Retreat
listings.subtitle: Tranquil Countryside, Harar
listings.description: Escape to this cozy cottage nestled in the tranquil countryside. Perfect for a weekend getaway. Enjoy the serene surroundings and explore nature trails nearby. Ideal for couples or solo travelers.
featureDescriptions: Enjoy breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape.
Stay warm and cozy on chilly evenings.
Surrounded by lush greenery, perfect for gardening enthusiasts.
Warm and inviting atmosphere with wooden accents throughout.

listings.title: Modern Urban Villa
listings.subtitle: Downtown Convenience, Bole
listings.description: Sleek and stylish urban villa in the heart of the city. Conveniently located near shopping centers and entertainment venues. Industrial chic design with high ceilings and exposed brick walls.
featureDescriptions: Enjoy stunning views of the city skyline.
Modern and trendy loft-style living space.
Stay fit and active with onsite fitness facilities.
Experience the convenience of smart home technology.

listings.title: Seaside Villa Escape
listings.subtitle: Oceanfront Luxury, Addis Ababa
listings.description: Indulge in luxury at this stunning oceanfront villa. Breathtaking views of the sea and private beach access. Elegant design with spacious living areas and deluxe amenities. Perfect for a luxurious retreat.
featureDescriptions: Relax and unwind in your own private pool.
Direct access to a pristine sandy beach.
Cook like a gourmet chef in the fully equipped kitchen.
Soak up the sun and enjoy stunning ocean views from the sun deck.

listings.title: Historic Townhouse Charm
listings.subtitle: Old Town Heritage, Harar
listings.description: Step back in time at this historic townhouse in the heart of Harar's old town. Preserving its original charm with modern updates. Exquisite architecture with intricate details and a tranquil courtyard.
featureDescriptions: Experience the rich history and architectural heritage.
A peaceful oasis in the heart of the city.
Charming original features add character and charm.
Relax and enjoy the view from your own private balcony.

listings.title: Mountain Chalet Getaway
listings.subtitle: Alpine Retreat, Semien Mountains
listings.description: Escape to this charming mountain chalet nestled in the Semien Mountains. Spectacular views of the surrounding peaks and lush forests. Cozy interior with a fireplace and rustic decor.
featureDescriptions: Breathtaking panoramic views of the majestic mountains.
Stay warm and cozy on chilly mountain nights.
Explore scenic hiking trails right outside your doorstep.
Relax and unwind in the luxurious jacuzzi after a day of adventure.

listings.title: Luxury Penthouse
listings.subtitle: Skyline Elegance, Kazanchis
listings.description: Experience luxury living at its finest in this exquisite penthouse apartment. Commanding views of the city skyline. High-end finishes and state-of-the-art amenities. Ideal for discerning buyers.
featureDescriptions: Enjoy stunning panoramic views of the city from every angle.
Luxurious finishes and attention to detail throughout.
Relax and entertain on your own private terrace.
Experience personalized service with 24/7 concierge assistance.
